overview: "When I was seventeen, I knew everything. I knew I was gonna be in a rock band, I knew I was gonna smoke a lot of weed, I knew I was gonna go on tour, and I knew I was gonna move to Florida and spend all my time on the beach.  And you know what? I was right."  Alien Propane is a story told from 10 years of collected VHS footage and endless miles across the Midwest and beyond.  This is the story of Punk Rock Artist, Joshua Nova.
tagline: Stay a Nite. Stay a Week. Stay a Lifetime.
title: Alien Propane
